title: Graduate HR Consultant
benefits: Hybrid work arrangement; exposure to diverse industries; structured mentoring; clear career progression to HR Adviser; foundation for long-term HR career
description: Gain hands-on HR experience across small and medium enterprises.
Support HR generalist services, recruitment, performance management, and strategic projects.
Work closely with clients and senior consultants while developing your HR skills.
Structured mentoring and clear pathway for career growth within MHR.
